channel.title: REQ:adding serverstatus

item.title: REQ:adding serverstatus
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

It doesn’t matter what type of forum you use, but you would have to do a script similar to this to make an output, My server doesn’t allow this method but it does work, you would have to edit the themes file of the front page.

[php]<?php
$ip = “private-server.no-ip.org”; //put your ipaddress here
$port= “43594”; //the port number
if (! $sock = @fsockopen($ip, $port, $num, $error, 5)) //Checks the server’s status (43594 = port)
{
echo “Offline”; //When server status is offline, output this
}
else
{
echo “Online”; //Else, output this
}
?>[/php]

Read full topic
